- Exterior steel door with peeling paint; multiple rust spots on the face, especially around lock area.
- Hardware: Schlage keypad deadbolt (electronic) and stainless lever handle; mounted but function not tested from image.
- Surface condition: noticeable rust/pitting and chipping paint; bottom edge shows wear.
- Frame/jamb: edge appears chipped; potential moisture exposure near trim.
- Recommendations: inspect for rust-through, refinish or replace door; reseal/replace weatherstripping; inspect jamb for rot and verify lock operation.
